Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi is back training ahead of the Quarter-Finals against Ecuador, so fans can hopefully get the chance to see him in action.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tickets to the match are completely sold out, but fans can score resale tickets at reasonable prices through Vivid Seats, SeatGeek, StubHub or Ticketmaster.
The cheapest tickets start at $138 before fees on SeatGeek.
Prices and availability are noted at the time of publishing and are subject to change.
Others: Ecuador most recently faced off against Mexico in Matchday 3 on June 30, which ended in a draw 0-0.
According to ESPN, the DraftKings Sportsbook line is: Argentina -620, Ecuador +430.
